projectGridLines.title: Backend Intern @ Premji Invest, Bangalore
projectGridLines.description:
About the firm

At Premji Invest, our goal is to generate best-in-class returns by supporting innovative entrepreneurs and high-performing companies. We invest in early-stage, growth equity and public markets across India and the United States. Our focus areas are financial services, technology, healthcare, consumer, industrials, and buyouts, with an underlying charter to back emerging and disruptive technologies and nurture the spirit of entrepreneurship in the country.  Our abiding purpose is to support the philanthropic initiatives of the Azim Premji Foundation, a not-for-profit organisation that seeks to help improve the lives of the underserved and underprivileged in society.


About the role

  • The team has a broad mandate to develop quantitative models for generating alpha in equity portfolios which can generate superior returns in mid to long term
  • In addition to these, the team is expected to develop risk models and optimal trade execution models
  • Leverage Generative AI to boost productivity of research and investment process
  • Develop robust back-testing infrastructure for the strategies, performance tracking and monitoring mechanisms for the signal performances and assessing slippages in the model
  • Developing and maintaining database of multiple datasets from various vendors. Creating their automated updation and monitoring jobs and checks for flagging anomalies.
  • Developing Website scrapers to procure custom datasets for research purpose.
  • Analytics framework for aiding the fundamental research and creating data visualization toolkit for enhancing the ease of extracting insights and locating value
  • Creating interactive dashboards for assessing and enhancing the performance of portfolios across the fund

Basic Qualifications

  • Pre-final year of Bachelorâ€™s/Dual Degree in Computer Science, EE, Maths and Data Science
  • Internships in professional software development experience are a plus
  • Intermediate to advanced programming experience with python is a must
  • Knowledge of the architecture and design (architecture, design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and current systems
  • Sought out knowledge source in: Computer Science fundamentals in object-oriented design, data structures, algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis
  • Advanced proficiency in, at least, one modern programming language such as C, C++, Java, or Python
